Authors:
Jian Wang, Robbert S. Gradstein, Dulip A.E. Daniels,
Rui-Liang Zhu
Title:
New synonymy in Ptychanthus striatus (Lejeuneaceae,
Marchantiophyta)
Keywords:
liverwort, molecular phylogeny, Ptychanthoideae,
Spruceanthus wiggintonii, taxonomy
Abstract:
Morphological and molecular evidence shows that
Spruceanthus wiggintonii A.E.D.Daniels, K.C.Kariyappa et P.Daniel from
southern India is a synonym of the widespread Ptychanthus striatus
(Lehm. et Lindenb.) Nees.

trees.title:
Ptychanthus striates Bayesian analysis using combined
genes
